job.title: Software Test Engineer
job.description: <p>Position Summary</p><p><strong>TIP Technologies, Inc.</strong> has an immediate opening for a full-time Software Test Engineer at our Waukesha, WI office. This individual will be responsible for the testing of our <strong>TIP<em>QA</em>™</strong> Enterprise Quality Assurance software to ensure that our software meets or exceeds specified standards and end-user requirements. &nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Responsibilities </p><ul><li>Engage in the manual testing of the <strong>TIP<em>QA</em>™</strong> software product.</li><li>Ensure that testing is thorough and rigorous and is accomplished with a high degree of accuracy and efficiency. </li><li>Perform duties, as defined below, to validate performance and coded-to-design specifications.</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Duties</p><ul><li>Develop and execute manual test plans and manual test cases based on functional specifications.</li><li>Develop and execute regression testing, stress and load testing of the application. </li><li>Document, troubleshoot, and isolate problems encountered during testing.</li><li>Work with members of the application development, product management, support, and QA teams to ensure high-quality applications. </li><li>Enter and verify issues in the Defect Tracking system</li><li>Suggest improvements with the testing life-cycle. </li><li>Document evolution of testing scripts for future replication. </li><li>Identifies, recommends and implements changes to enhance the effectiveness of quality assurance strategies.</li><li>Performs all other duties as assigned.</li></ul><p><br></p><p>Experience</p><p>• Bachelors Degree, or equivalent experience preferred. </p><p>• 2+ years experience in manual software testing, or quality assurance of software applications. </p><p>• 2+ years experience developing test plans/strategies, test cases, and test scripts and traceability process of requirements to test cases. </p><p>• Experience planning and estimating testing duration and effort. </p><p>• Experience with database verification testing. </p><p>• Knowledge and experience with QMS/ERP/MRP systems desired. </p><p>• Knowledge and experience with ERP interface (Oracle, SAP, etc.) desired. </p><p>• Load and stress testing experience desired.</p><p>• Customer Support experience a plus.</p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p>Requirements and Competencies</p><p>• Must have a working knowledge of quality assurance methodologies. </p><p>• Have a proven track record on the ability to quickly gain detailed understanding of complex applications and their designs.</p><p>• Must have the ability to work independently with limited supervision.</p><p>• Ability to work both independently and as part of a team and thrive on technical challenges. </p><p>• Possess strong analytical skills.</p><p>• Demonstrates good problem-solving skills in a software test environment.</p><p>• Capable of establishing goals and priorities with an ability to multi-task. </p><p>• Self starter who can handle a high stress fast paced environment.</p><p>• Excellent oral and written communication skills.</p><p>• Ability to establish priorities and multitask.</p><p>• Dedication to going above and beyond during critical test situations.</p><p>Candidates responding to this posting must currently possess the eligibility to work in the United States.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>This is a fulltime Salaried Exempt position, with the expectation of 45+ hours per week.</p>
